results.name: Half of number of integer solutions to the equation x^2 + 3y^2 = n.
reference: N. J. Fine, Basic Hypergeometric Series and Applications, Amer. Math. Soc., 1988; p. 78, Eq. (32.25).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
M. D. Hirschhorn, The number of representations of a number by various forms, Discrete Mathematics 298 (2005), 205-211.
José Manuel Rodríguez Caballero, Divisors on overlapped intervals and multiplicative functions, arXiv:1709.09621 [math.NT], 2017.
formula: Multiplicative with a(2^e) = 3*(1+(-1)^e)/2, a(3^e) = 1, a(p^e) = (1+(-1)^e)/2 if p==2 (mod 3) and a(p^e) = 1+e if p==1 (mod 3). - Corrected by _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 20 2017
maple: sigmamr := proc(n,m,r) local a,d ; a := 0 ; for d in numtheory[divisors](n) do if modp(d,m) = r then  a := a+1 ; end if; end do: a; end proc:
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, 1/2 * polcoeff( sum(k=1, sqrtint(n), 2*x^k^2, 1 + x*O(x^n)) * sum(k=1, sqrtint(n\3), 2*x^(3*k^2), 1 + x*O(x^n)), n))};
(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, qfrep([1, 0; 0, 3], n)[n])}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 05 2005 */

(Scheme) (definec (A096936 n) (if (= 1 n) n (let ((p (A020639 n)) (e (A067029 n)) (rest (A096936 (A028234 n)))) (cond ((= 2 p) (* (if (odd? e) 0 3) rest)) ((= 3 p) rest) ((= 1 (modulo p 3)) (* (+ 1 e) rest)) (else (* (if (odd? e) 0 1) rest)))))) ;; With the memoization-macro definec, after the given multiplicative formula. - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 20 2017
